import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Upload } from "../../EntryFile/imagePath"; import Select2 from "react-select2-wrapper"; import "react-select2-wrapper/css/select2.css"; const options = [ { id: 1, text: "Select", text: "Select" }, { id: 2, text: "owner", text: "owner" }, ]; const AddUser = () => { const [passwordShown, setPasswordShown] = useState(false); const togglePassword = () => { setPasswordShown(!passwordShown); }; return ( <>
